scripts.dev: concurrently -k "tsc -p tsconfig.electron.json --watch" "vite" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 dist/electron/main.js && cross-env ELECTRON_START_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron --inspect=9229 dist/electron/main.js"
scripts.dev:watch-electron: wait-on http://localhost:5173 dist/electron/main.js && nodemon --watch dist/electron --ext js --delay 100ms --exec "electron dist/electron/main.js"
